description:
Hogtied is pleased to offer you a taste of the Eastern bondage culture. We
offer you an authentic view into the look and feel of Eastern Bondage
and BDSM practices, shot on location in Japan with Japanese models.
Renowned bondage master Osada Steve and Japanese bondage model Misa give us some exposure to the way bondage is practiced in this
very different corner of the world. This week hogtied brings to you
the BDSM world of Japan.
title: Osada Steve and Misa
